parameters.query: SELECT id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_facture, date_facture, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut FROM invoices WHERE id = $1 AND tenant_id = $2 AND statut NOT IN ('brouillon', 'annulee')

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_avoir FROM 'AVO-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM avoirs WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND numero_avoir LIKE 'AVO-' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())::text || '-%'

INSERT INTO avoirs (id, tenant_id, client_final_id, invoice_id, numero_avoir, date_avoir, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, motif, description, statut, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, $2, $3, $4, NOW(), $5, $6, $7, 'Avoir sur facture ' || $8, $9, 'brouillon', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id, tenant_id, client_final_id, invoice_id, numero_avoir, date_avoir, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, motif, statut, created_at
SELECT id, invoice_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM invoice_lines WHERE invoice_id = $1 ORDER BY ordre ASC
UPDATE invoices SET statut = 'annulee', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1 AND tenant_id = $2 RETURNING id, statut
